Class Game

java.lang.Object
  Game

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

The main class to execute the game named Battleship with a Twist.The aim of Battleship with a Twist is for a player to try and destroy all of the computer opponents ships before the computer destroys all of the players ships placed on the playing grid.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Haoyu Zhang

Constructor Summary
Game()
          Create a ShipList with default constructor for both player and computer.
Game(ShipList playerShips, ShipList computerShips)
          Create a ShipList with given shiplist objects for both player and computer.
 
Method Summary
 void start()
          The main method to start the game.It would display the settings in the "gamesettings.txt" file.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

start

public void start()
The main method to start the game.It would display the settings in the "gamesettings.txt" file. User and computer then set their ships and game begins.
